text: Egha Moses kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Atrivim, nɨn ingangarir gumaziba bar na bagh izɨ nan guamɨn tevibar pɨrɨva, pamten kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, nɨ mangɨ uan gumazamiziba sara inigh mangɨ. Eghtɨ kɨ mangam. Arazir kaba otivightɨ, kɨ gɨn Isip ategham.” Egha Moses navim isia anɨngagha atrivim ategha azenan ghu.
